name: wk-06-reactblog
description: Demo Blog Page Built with React

scripts.dev: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -R src/app/images dist/app && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
scripts.postinstall: webpack -p && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -R src/app/images dist/app

author: Matt Sadauckas
